instruction: Create a game based on a given topic.
output: Weather Bingo: This game is played with a standard Bingo sheet but with images and terms related to weather instead of numbers. A card generator can be used to generate various cards with images related to weather such as snow, hail, lightning and rainbows. The players search the playing area for the images on their card to form Bingo lines. The first person to get a full line of weather images is the winner!
